laboratory_examinations.findings: Undetectable (< 1.0 µg/dl) in patient 1; 6.2 µg/dl in patient 2; 11.3 µg/dl in patient 3.
Elevated at 1250 pg/ml in all three patients (normal range: 10–50 pg/ml).
No response in all three patients.
Mildly elevated at 5.3 ng/ml/h in patient 1; 5.4 ng/ml/h in patient 2; 20.2 ng/ml/h in patient 3 (normal range: 0.3–3.9 ng/ml/h).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1 PRA normalized to 1.1–2.9 ng/ml/h on hydrocortisone replacement therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal at 15.5 ng/dl in patient 1; at the lower range of normal at 6.7 ng/dl in patient 2; 12.4 ng/dl in patient 3 (normal range: 4–31 ng/dl).
